PLOT SUMMARY

BELLE AND SEBASTIAN is based on the much-loved childrens book and
French TV series. Set during the Second World War, it is the timeless
tale of a boy and his dog. Six year old orphan Sebastian lives on the
mountainside with a kindly but gruff caretaker. He comes across Belle,
a wild mountain dog and together they form an unshakable bond as they
go on an amazing adventure through the French Alps, becoming pivotal
in the attempted escape of refugees fleeing Nazi Germany for the safety
of Switzerland.
